name: Mean Muggin'
description:
Catch the mug before it falls off the table!

[SPACE] to catch
[ESC] to exit to the title screen

---

DISCLAIMER: The sound files for this game are VERY loud, and I didn't put in a mute function. Turn down your headphones before playing!

I built this for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam. The game is basically a low-res clone of my favourite WarioWare, Inc. microgame:  Mug Shot!

I've essentially never coded before (outside of some basic HTML/CSS in Twine), so this was a really fun challenge. Please do not look at my code, it is a mESS.

Quick thanks to my beautiful boyfriend, Jack, for the music.
